title: What is the total number of tenements [Item 10(a) (iv) plus Item 10(c)]? Note
clause_text: What is the total number of tenements [Item 10(a) (iv) plus Item 10(c)]? Note. -INDICATE DETAILS ON THE BUILDING PLAN AS IN FORM 1. Does the front open space comply with the Regulations? Do they comply with Regulations 41(2)(i)(a)? Regulations 41(6)? If so, are the open spaces separate or distinct for each wing as required by Regulations 41(1)(a)

source_pdf.text_snippet: What is the total number of tenements [Item 10(a) (iv) plus Item 10(c)]? Note. -INDICATE DETAILS ON THE BUILDING PLAN AS IN FORM 1.
